code: import React,{useState}from'react';import TransferCertificate from'./TransferCertificate';import CharacterCertificate from'./CharacterCertificate';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Certificates=()=>{const[activeTab,setActiveTab]=useState('overview');const renderContent=()=>{switch(activeTab){case'tc':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TransferCertificate,{});case'cc':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CharacterCertificate,{});default:return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"menu-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Certificates"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Generate student certificates."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"button-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn",onClick:()=>setActiveTab('tc'),children:"Transfer Certificate"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn",onClick:()=>setActiveTab('cc'),children:"Character Certificate"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"certificate-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Transfer Certificate (TC)"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Generate transfer certificates for students leaving the institution."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Character Certificate (CC)"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Generate character certificates for students."})]})]});}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"menu-content",children:[activeTab!=='overview'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"tab-navigation",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"back-btn",onClick:()=>setActiveTab('overview'),children:"\u2190 Back to Certificates"})}),renderContent()]});};export default Certificates;
